title: Nos API Documentation
subtitle: Stable, production-ready endpoints for price, volume, and holders
limitedNotice: Right now we expose price, volume, and holders publicly. More endpoints are coming soon — watch Twitter/X for release announcements and check back here for updates.

intro.title: Overview
intro.text: All endpoints are versioned under /v3 and return JSON. Use your API key on every request.

auth.title: Authentication
auth.text: Provide your key in either the X-API-Key header or Authorization: Bearer header.
auth.note: You can request a key under Tools → API Keys in the top navigation.

prices.title: Prices
prices.desc: Spot prices, charts, and stats for NOS.

volume.title: Volume
volume.desc: Aggregated trading volume across venues with clean attribution.

holders.title: Holders
holders.desc: Total holders, charts, and distribution metrics.
